cpl_query.extension¶

cpl_query.extension.iterable_abc¶

class cpl_query.extension.iterable_abc.IterableABC(t: Optional[type] = None, values: Optional[list] = None)¶

Bases: abc.ABC, list

ABC to define functions on list
